Title: Data Science Engineer, AI Lab
Description:
About Permira

Permira is a global investment firm that backs successful businesses with growth ambitions. Founded in 1985, the firm advises funds across two core asset classes, private equity and credit, with total committed capital of approximately ‚Ç¨80bn. The Permira private equity funds make both long-term majority (Buyout) and minority (Growth Equity) investments in four key sectors: Technology, Consumer, Healthcare, Services. The Permira credit funds support businesses with flexible financing solutions across Direct Lending, Strategic Opportunities and CLO Management. Established in 2007, the firm advises investment funds and products which have provided approximately ‚Ç¨20 billion of debt capital to over 300 businesses.

Role Overview

We are seeking an individual to join our AI Lab which sits within our Technology Value Creation Team. Our portfolio includes many of the world‚Äôs leading software and tech-enabled companies with landmark technology investments including Zendesk, Mimecast, Informatica, Squarespace, McAfee, and many more. You can learn more about our portfolio here: https://www.permira.com/portfolio

This team will be a central entity that develops and deploys machine learning capabilities across Permira, collaborating with our teams and sectors. At Permira, AI is not just another IT initiative‚Äîit‚Äôs a fundamental shift in how we work, think, and operate. We are committed to embedding AI deeply into the fabric of our products and workflows‚Äînot merely as an add-on, but as a reimaging of what our offerings can be in an AI-native world.

Our strategy focuses on identifying a few high-impact, needle-moving use cases where AI can drive measurable value. The focus of the AI Lab will be first internal use cases, to deploy AI to make better and faster investment decisions, and secondly to the portfolio, supporting Permira portfolio companies on specific AI initiatives. Our goal with the AI Lab is encourage our teams and portfolio companies to be truly AI-native and drive tangible impact with faster innovation velocity, streamlined revenue efficiency, and deliberate cost savings.

This is a hands-on role, where you will spend most of your time developing in Python together with our team of Data Scientists (DSs) and Machine Learning Engineers (MLEs). You will also be interfacing directly with subject matter experts and stakeholders, e.g. to evaluate the feasibility of potential DS use cases or to explain how your model works during a Team Review.

This role is based in Permira‚Äôs Milan office, and you will be part of a geographically distributed team (UK/US/Europe) that embraces remote and hybrid collaboration.

Key Responsibilities


(Develop & ship models) Develop and maintain ML models for a range of use cases at Permira. Ensure these models smoothly reach production and bring measurable value to our stakeholders
(Analysis) Perform efficient exploratory data analysis (EDA) and present key insights to colleagues & stakeholders
(Best practices) Adopt best practices and standards for the development of robust ML models
(MLOps) Collaborate closely with MLEs to prepare your code & model for production using our ML Platform
(Project start-up) Help evaluate the feasibility of new use cases for ML


What We‚Äôre Looking For

We are looking for a high-performing, analytically sharp, and emotionally intelligent professional who thrives at the intersection of AI, business transformation, and investment. Ideal candidates will have:


2-5 years‚Äô experience in data science and machine learning, including the development of models that successfully went to production
You are an expert in using applied ML on structured data, in particular regression and classification problems
You have basic experience with Generative AI, both large language models (LLMs) and embedding models, especially leveraging GenAI in non-chat applications
You approach complex problems in a structured way, always looking for the simplest, pragmatic solutions
You understand the technical and non-technical constraints of a business problem
You are detail-oriented but can also quickly shift priorities if required
You enjoy working collaboratively in a cross-functional & distributed team environment
You have great presentation skills and can communicate to a wide variety of audiences
You have a strong foundation in statistics
You have solid software engineering skills and love coding in Python
You know your way around a linux shell and are comfortable with Git for version control.
You know the scikit-learn API inside and out
You are comfortable in an agile Way of Working, with Scrum or similar frameworks
A strong cultural fit with Permira‚Äîteam-first, intellectually curious, low-ego, and entrepreneurial


Nice To Have


Experience with native AI suites, for example, Google Cloud (i.e. Platform Vertex AI) or Microsoft Azure
Experience with (Py)Spark to handle large datasets
Familiarity with DevOps & MLOps principles
M.Sc. or Ph.D. in Machine Learning, the natural sciences, or similar


To learn how we handle your personal data during the recruitment process, please review our Candidate Privacy Policy. This includes our Supplemental CCPA Notice of Collection where applicable.

Title: Junior Data Scientist
HTML:
Cosa ti proponiamo

All‚Äôinterno della divisione Eng Digital per la business line Eng AI & Data siamo alla ricerca di una figura di Junior Data Scientist per progettualit√† legate al AI, GenAI, Machine Learning e Data Science nella nostra unit√† di sviluppo di LLM proprietari.

Quali saranno le tue attivit√† e responsabilit√†?

Sarai Responsabile Di Attivit√† Di Analisi, Sviluppo e Implementazione Di Soluzioni Avanzate Basate Sul Machine Learning, AI e Generative AI Collaborando Con Un Team Di Data Scientist Ed AI Engineer. In Particolare, Ti Occuperai Delle Seguenti Attivit√†

  • Progettare e sviluppare soluzioni di AI/ML robuste e scalabili;
  • Ottimizzare algoritmi e modelli di AI/ML;
  • Supportare la gestione dell'intero ciclo di vita di progetti di Data Science e Artificial Intelligence, dalla concezione al deployment;
  • Redigere e mantenere la documentazione tecniche relativa a Soluzioni e Modelli di AI.

Qualifiche e competenze richieste

  • Recente laurea in Ingegneria Informatica, Informatica o similari;
  • Esperienza nello sviluppo di soluzioni Python con le principali librerie di Machine Learning (es. Scikit Learn) e per la visualizzazione (es. Matplotlib, Plotly, Bokeh, ecc.);
  • Esperienza nell‚Äôuso di framework di deep learning e NLP (es. PyTorch, Hugging Face, Langchain);
  • Esperienza nell‚Äôuso di sistemi di versionamento del codice (es. GIT);
  • Conoscenza delle principali tecniche di valutazione delle performance di Algoritmi di AI;
  • Familiarit√† nello sviluppo di API, basate su architetture a microservizi;
  • Buone capacit√† comunicative e di presentazione.

Competenze Aggiuntive Preferenziali

  • Conoscenze di base della teoria dei modelli generativi e LLM;
  • Conoscenza di framework e best practice per il serving LLM in Production (es. vLLM, LLMOps, Pachyderm);
  • Esperienza nella creazione di soluzioni basate su container tramite l‚Äôuso di strumenti di virtualizzazione e scaling (es. Docker, Kubernetes);
  • Conoscenza delle piattaforme Cloudera e Databricks;
  • Conoscenza di HPC, Triton, Cuda, SLURM;
  • Conoscenza del framework Ray per il calcolo distribuito;
  • Familiarit√† nell‚Äôuso di tecnologie cloud a supporto dello sviluppo dello sviluppo di soluzioni di AI, su almeno uno dei principali hyperscaler (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform);
  • Esperienza nella redazione di documentazione tecnica.

Cosa cerchiamo nelle nostre persone?

  • Ambizione, nel perseguire grandi obiettivi e nell'investire sul miglioramento continuo;
  • Proattivit√†, nell‚Äôanticipare e affrontare le sfide con iniziativa;
  • Trasparenza, nel comunicare apertamente e fornire feedback costruttivi;
  • Motivazione a migliorare e a crescere insieme agli altri, manifestando apertura al confronto per favorire la crescita collettiva e il raggiungimento degli obiettivi comuni.

Invia la tua candidatura e raccontaci come puoi fare la differenza.‚ÄØ

SEDE DI INSERIMENTO

Milano | Torino | Padova

L‚Äôannuncio √® rivolto a tutti i candidati, senza distinzione di sesso, nel rispetto del Codice delle pari opportunit√† di cui al D.Lgs. 198/2006 e ss.mm.ii.

Title: Junior - Officine Innovazione
HTML:
Stiamo cercando delle figure junior da inserire nel team di Officine Innovazione di Deloitte nella sede di Milano, che lavorer√† in modalit√† Hybrid.

Il team di Officine Innovazione si occupa di promuovere la cultura dell‚Äôinnovazione e fornire alle imprese clienti servizi di Innovation Development e Management, operando a livello nazionale e internazionale, anche attraverso iniziative multi-player e partnership con attori chiave dell‚Äôecosistema, con lo scopo di guidare l‚Äôevoluzione della business community in Italia in una logica pi√π ampia di Trasferimento Tecnologico, Open Innovation e Venture Building, integrando a 360¬∞ il mondo delle aziende consolidate, delle startup/scaleup, del venture capital e delle universit√† e centri di ricerca.

Your Role

Le risorse Junior saranno inserite in un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:

  • Supportare il team nella interpretazione dei bisogni del cliente e nella definizione delle metodologie e negli approcci pi√π adatti per la loro ottimale soddisfazione;
  • Individuare, selezionare ed eventualmente customizzare gli strumenti pi√π utili per la raccolta ed analisi di dati e l‚Äôelaborazione di soluzioni a supporto degli obiettivi del cliente;
  • Produrre analisi solide e corredate da dati fattuali in modo autonomo, utilizzando strumenti e risorse messe a disposizione;
  • Individuare potenziali problematiche di progetto, condividerle tempestivamente con il resto del team e collaborare produttivamente in team interfunzionali ed internazionali.

Winning Requirements

  • Laurea magistrale in materie economiche, ingegneristiche o tecnico/scientifiche (conseguita o in corso di completamento);
  • Eccellente percorso accademico;
  • Forte interesse per progetti di Innovation Management e tecnologie come AI, Robotics, Blockchain, IoT, AR/VR;
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese scritta e parlata;

Costituisce titolo preferenziale la conoscenza delle principali metodologie di Innovation Management (Business Model Canvas, Lean Startup, Design Thinking, Startup acceleration).

Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte √® un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Strategy, Risk & Transaction Advisory, Tax & Legal e Technology & Transformation. Il nostro obiettivo √® supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilit√† √® un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualit√† legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la societ√†. Scopri di pi√π sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinch√© siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un‚Äôorganizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all‚Äôinterno e all‚Äôesterno dell‚Äôorganizzazione.

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme? Candidati ora!

Le persone interessate possono inviare la propria candidatura con autorizzazione ai sensi del dlgs. 196/2003. La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed √® aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, et√†, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio √® stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell‚Äôinclusivit√†.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
üöÄAbout Ampcontrol

Ampcontrol is building AI-powered software for optimizing electric vehicle (EV) fleet charging.

We are a venture backed hybrid team of engineers and energy experts based in Europe, the U.S.A., Canada and South America, building the new way of EV charging. Our primary goal is to enable a simple, reliable & cost efficient transition to zero emission vehicles for fleet operators.

Our company culture includes minimal hierarchy; We make technical decisions based on consensus and aim at simplicity and clarity.

Read more about us on our website: https://ampcontrol.io/

üåé Our Mission

We're on a mission to speed up the transition of the automotive and logistic industries to electric fleets and vehicles.

We believe in a future of self-managing, reliable and affordable charging for companies, fleet operators and humans on our planet.

üíª The Role

You will be:


Building, improving and operating our Python backend, including RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, TimescaleDB, Redis, asynchronous services and customer facing APIs with FastAPI
Collaborating with our DevOps team to improve and extend our GCP deployment
Maintaining and improving our extensive test suite, including end-to-end-, BDD-, integration- and unit tests
Learning in-depth the EV charging domain, relevant specifications, standards and integrations
Working with our data science team to build real-time optimization and AI solutions
Investigating, troubleshooting complex backend issues, make performance improvements and mitigate scalability challenges
Building, maintaining and migrating databases and accommodate time-series data
Contributing to our AI-driven development process by following established dos and don'ts
Onboard to our innovative edge server project, learning about ModBus, MQTT and secure websocket protocols


üìç Location

We're a hybrid team. You can work from Europe, the United States, Canada, or South America, with in-office options in New York, and Erlangen, Germany.

Requirements


You can apply at all levels, but you have at least 2 years of full-time work experience with a software stack similar to ours
You can elaborate on why you love Python, its ecosystem and components present in our tech stack
You are confident in your Python coding skills to produce clean, well-tested and idiomatic code and learn fast on the job when necessary
You have hands-on experience with at least one cloud computing platform
You have a good understanding of DevOps tools and methods
You can communicate in English with clarity about complex technical topics
You are motivated to work in the EV and sustainability domain
You understand the differences between types of databases and you are comfortable with at least SQL schema design, indexes and migrations
You appreciate our flat hierarchy, collaborative work environment and understand why we prioritize helping each other first


Benefits


Internationally competitive salary
Equity incentive plans
Parental leave and generous PTO
Healthcare and dental plans
Global offsites
Personal growth plan and mentoring


Please note: We're flexible in how we work together. This role can be set up as a contract position, or you can be hired through our Employer of Record (EOR) partner, or directly through our US entity, depending on your location and preference.

  • Learning in-depth the EV charging domain, relevant specifications, standards and integrations
  • Working with our data science team to build real-time optimization and AI solutions
  • Investigating, troubleshooting complex backend issues, make performance improvements and mitigate scalability challenges
  • Building, maintaining and migrating databases and accommodate time-series data
  • Contributing to our AI-driven development process by following established dos and don'ts
  • Onboard to our innovative edge server project, learning about ModBus, MQTT and secure websocket protocols

üìç Location

We're a hybrid team. You can work from Europe, the United States, Canada, or South America, with in-office options in New York, and Erlangen, Germany.

Requirements

  • You can apply at all levels, but you have at least 2 years of full-time work experience with a software stack similar to ours
  • You can elaborate on why you love Python, its ecosystem and components present in our tech stack
  • You are confident in your Python coding skills to produce clean, well-tested and idiomatic code and learn fast on the job when necessary
  • You have hands-on experience with at least one cloud computing platform
  • You have a good understanding of DevOps tools and methods
  • You can communicate in English with clarity about complex technical topics
  • You are motivated to work in the EV and sustainability domain
  • You understand the differences between types of databases and you are comfortable with at least SQL schema design, indexes and migrations
  • You appreciate our flat hierarchy, collaborative work environment and understand why we prioritize helping each other first

Benefits

  • Internationally competitive salary
  • Equity incentive plans
  • Parental leave and generous PTO
  • Healthcare and dental plans
  • Global offsites
  • Personal growth plan and mentoring

Please note: We're flexible in how we work together. This role can be set up as a contract position, or you can be hired through our Employer of Record (EOR) partner, or directly through our US entity, depending on your location and preference.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist




Are you curious and ready to accept a new challenge in your career? Are you eager to join a dynamic company and bring innovation through your work and skills?




Prometeia offers you opportunities for growth and training in a Group with over 1000 professionals working for more than 500 clients in 20 countries around the world.




RESPONSIBILITIES:




‚óè Analyze large volumes of structured and unstructured data in banking and insurance, identifying useful patterns and insights to support business processes and decisions.

‚óè Design, develop and implement advanced machine learning, data mining and statistical models to solve complex problems in finance.

‚óè Collaborate in cross-functional teams to define project requirements and propose innovative solutions.

‚óè Contribute to the development of proprietary frameworks and algorithms to improve the performance of solutions offered to our clients.

‚óè Present complex results to technical and non-technical stakeholders, making analysis results understandable.

‚óè Support customers in implementing solutions, ensuring knowledge transfer and customization.




REQUIREMENTS:




‚óè Experience in data wrangling, cleaning, exploration and feature extraction.

‚óè Excellent knowledge of Python and the most important analytical libraries.

‚óè Knowledge of statistics, Machine Learning and major clustering, classification and regression algorithms

‚óè Advanced knowledge of statistical techniques, predictive modeling with the application of Machine Learning models, and data analysis.

‚óè Ability to creatively solve complex problems and propose innovative solutions.

‚óè Ability to rapidly prototype ideas/solutions with a critical/experimental approach to data analysis.

‚óè Good communication skills and ability to translate technical results into insights for non-experts.

‚óè Aptitude for teamwork, with strong orientation toward interdisciplinary collaboration.

‚óè At least one year of working experience in applied ML projects.




EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:

‚óè Master's degree or PhD with excellent grades in Data Science, Statistics, Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related fields




NICE TO HAVE:

‚óè Experience with code versioning systems (git).

‚óè Experience in Pyspark development and working in big data platforms.

‚óè Knowledge of at least one major cloud environment (Azure, GCP, AWS).

‚óè Experience in processing and modeling with unstructured data (Text Analytics, Computer Vision)




SOFT SKILLS:

A problem-solver with a strong analytical mindset.
Exceptional communication skills and meticulous attention to detail.
A team player with excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Passionate about process innovation and driven by curiosity to understand and optimize business processes.







LOCATION:

Milan




WHAT WE OFFER:

COMPENSATION, WELFARE & BENEFIT

Our history, as well as the future, is based on the value of our people. The biggest investment at Prometeia is in our people, and it concerns every aspect of professional life. We call it 'Total Compensation' and is made up of Compensation - consisting of a fixed and a variable component -, an important Welfare Plan, active since 2015 ‚Äì we have been among the first to introduce it in Italy - and Benefits, which include all the initiatives undertaken for the well-being of our people.




REMOTE WORKING

Flexibility is an intrinsic value of the way we work. At Prometeia, smart working is an organizational method based on trust, which results in benefits in terms of work/life balance, impact on the environment and optimization of company results, through autonomy and empowerment of people.




PEOPLE PROGRAM

Our evaluation system is based on the full enhancement of people and their continuous dialogue as a stimulus for regular, mutual professional and personal growth. Transparent discussions between managers and team members are set up within the projects, where reciprocal and timely feedback is exchanged. The process is fully digitalized and aimed at continuously improving the development trajectory of the individual and the company.




TRAINING

Prometeia means ongoing training. We provide an average of 11 days of training per year to our people, in person and online. Particular attention is paid to younger colleagues, who are the protagonists of dedicated growth programs, and to the continuous sharing and internal transfer of know-how and skills. On-the-job training is also important, through immediate and direct confrontation with the market.




WIN/WIN POLICY

If you are one of our employees, and you recommend a person who is later recruited, you are entitled to a financial bonus! This is an important opportunity to contribute to the growth of Prometeia as a whole, by attracting acknowledged market professionals and new tech talents.




PHYGITAL MANAGEMENT

Through the dedicated app Pr(Home)teia, we have completely digitalized and integrated the management of our physical and virtual environments. Access to the office, smart working, workstations, meeting rooms, car pooling... everything is just a click away.




COMMUNITY

Our Community is extremely diverse, as are the skills of the people who are part of it and who share its values, and the individuals and organizations that are directly or indirectly involved in our activities. Clients, People of the Group, Alumni, Institutions, Academia, non-profit entities with which we actively collaborate, are stakeholders representing a great value for us, in terms of trust and collaboration.




DIVERSITY

We promote and respect equal opportunities and consider differences as a value. Diversity & Inclusion are fundamental values: from the selection phase to everyday life, also through dedicated training moments to develop individual sensitivities and unicities.




IMPACT

We responsibly take an active role towards the environment, the territories and the communities in which we operate. Our Headquarter in Bologna has obtained the Leed Gold Certification, one of the highest awards that recognizes the performance of the building in terms of energy and water savings, reduction of CO2 emissions, improvement of the ecological quality of the interior, materials and resources used. In the Sustainability Report we report the results achieved within the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of the 2030 Agenda that, drafted by the United Nations in 2016, we have been supporting since 2020.

Title: AI Developer Intern - Milano [DIG]
HTML:
Trasforma le tue aspirazioni professionali in una storia di successo, entra in PwC come AI Developer Intern.

Your Perspectives

Entra a far parte del nostro team Digital Innovation - AI Center of Excellence in rapida crescita e partecipa allo sviluppo di rivoluzionarie applicazioni basate su tecnologie di Intelligenza Artificiale. Avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† di:

  • Sviluppare progetti basati su algoritmi di intelligenza artificiale, sia per ottimizzazioni dei processi interni o per clienti che integrati in innovative soluzioni software;
  • Contribuire attivamente alla crescita della nostra struttura dedicata all'Intelligenza Artificiale, in particolare al Natural Language Understanding e alla Computer Vision;
  • Partecipare al ciclo di vita di un prodotto basato su AI, dall‚Äôanalisi del business case, al tuning dei modelli, allo sviluppo delle componenti applicative richieste dall‚Äôapplicazione fino alla realizzazione della User Experience ideale;
  • Muoverti in un contesto organizzato, dove gli aspetti metodologici e di relazione assumono una rilevanza strategica con respiro internazionale e multiculturale;
  • Operare in un contesto organizzato, dove gli aspetti metodologici e di relazione assumono una rilevanza strategica con respiro internazionale e multiculturale;
  • Garantire l‚Äôerogazione dei deliverables di progetto concordati con il Project Manager di riferimento e con i committenti, in accordo con i vincoli di budget e quality condivisi;
  • Fornire supporto applicativo a soluzioni basate su moduli di Intelligenza Artificiale, Large Language Models e Computer Vision, sia esistenti che di nuova realizzazione.

Your unique strengths

  • Possiedi una laurea in discipline STEM;
  • Possiedi tecniche di ascolto attivo, capacit√† di sintesi e di problem solving;
  • Ti contraddistingui per intraprendenza e curiosit√†, spiccato senso di responsabilit√† professionale;
  • Possiedi una conoscenza avanzata della lingua inglese (parlata e scritta).

Set your expectation higher

PwC ti sorprender√† con un‚Äôopportunit√† di carriera che ti far√† sentire al centro della societ√†, dell‚Äôinnovazione e del cambiamento. Il tuo talento e la tua curiosit√† avranno tutto lo spazio che meritano e, attraverso l‚Äôidentificazione delle migliori risorse, contribuirai a garantire la qualit√† dei servizi che offriamo ai nostri clienti. In questo percorso di crescita sarai accompagnato da colleghi esperti e da una formazione continua e su misura grazie alla quale potrai mettere le tue competenze a disposizione dei clienti interni.

Feel at home

Ci prendiamo cura delle nostre persone, abbracciando le diversit√† e creando valore per i clienti, le persone e la comunit√†, nel rispetto dell'ambiente. GIVE YOUR LIFE A DIFFERENT PERSPECTIVE

Title: Junior ‚Äì Monitor Deloitte
Description:
Stiamo cercando figure junior da inserire nel team di Monitor Deloitte nella sede di Milano, che lavorer√† in modalit√† Hybrid.

Your Role

Nel ruolo di Analyst, all‚Äôinterno del team di lavoro la risorsa si occuper√† di:


Strategic Transformation & Innovation: supporto nella definizione di strategie innovative e sostenibili di business transformation volte alla creazione di valore delle aziende clienti con l‚Äôobiettivo di ottimizzare il proprio portafoglio prodotti, adottando un approccio orientato alla differenziazione;
Customer Strategy: supporto nella definizione e realizzazione di strategie e processi di trasformazione dei modelli di marketing, customer management e pricing;
Digital Strategy: supporto nella definizione di strategie orientate alla digital transformation;
M&A Strategy: supporto nella gestione dell‚Äôintero processo di M&A, dalla definizione della strategia fino alla selezione del giusto partner passando per la conduzione di una commercial due diligence approfondita, fino alla chiusura del deal e alla relativa gestione del programma di integrazione.


Winning Requirements


Laurea Magistrale conseguita oppure a massimo 6 mesi dal suo conseguimento
Esperienza da 0 a 1 anni in societ√† di consulenza strategica
Brillante percorso accademico in ambito: Economico, Ingegneristico, Informatico, Fisico, Matematico o Statistico
Esperienza pregressa in contesti internazionali
Ottimo livello di inglese


Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte √® un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro obiettivo √® supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilit√† √® un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualit√† legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la societ√†. Scopri di pi√π sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinch√© siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un‚Äôorganizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all‚Äôinterno e all‚Äôesterno dell‚Äôorganizzazione.

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme? Candidati ora!

La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed √® aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, et√†, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio √® stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell‚Äôinclusivit√†.

Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualit√† legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la societ√†. Title: Senior Data Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
About Prestatech




At Prestatech, we're redefining the financial world by fostering innovation and challenging the traditional banking system. Our culture is diverse, dynamic, and forward-thinking. From our offices in Berlin and Milan, we create cutting-edge API technologies in an inclusive environment where everyone can contribute their best work.




Founded in 2021 by Christian Nothacker, Luca Terragni, and Lorenzo Giusti, Prestatech combines document automation and proprietary technology to help financial institutions and B2B companies make quick, reliable, and inclusive credit decisions for SMEs and consumers.




When most people think of getting a loan or mortgage, they picture a slow and tedious process. Our mission is to simplify that through technology.




We‚Äôre a young and fast-growing company‚Äîbut this is our second venture. Before Prestatech, we founded and exited Prestacap, a lending platform for SMEs active in Italy and Germany.




We‚Äôre passionate about data and technology, never satisfied with the status quo, and believe that teamwork is key to achieving ambitious goals together.




To date, we have raised ‚Ç¨8 million, which is helping us bring more innovative solutions to market, expand operations in Italy, and launch in the UK, Germany, and the US..




We‚Äôre now looking for a Senior Data Scientist (m/f/d), someone with prior experience in fintech who is hands-on, outcome-driven, and deeply curious about solving business problems with data and AI.


Tasks


You would be joining a flexible and dynamic team and your role will include:





selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques


processing, cleansing and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis


deep dive on the problems using SQL and scripting languages to drive solutions leveraging Statistical Analysis


implement and scale data pipelines and solutions using Big Data technologies


design, train, and deploy machine learning models and AI-based solutions for credit scoring, fraud detection, and other core financial applications.


collaborate closely with the development team to recommend and build innovations based on Data Science


own the process: identify and execute on high impact projects, triage external requests, and make sure you bring projects to conclusion in time for the results to be useful


leverage AI tools to achieve even better and faster results



Requirements



6+ years of experience in Data Science, ideally in fintech or financial services


Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or related field (MSc/PhD preferred)


Strong understanding of Big Data frameworks and cloud platforms.


Expertise in machine learning and AI techniques


Proficient in Python, with hands-on experience using Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn


Skilled in working with SQL/NoSQL databases


Experience with version control (Git) and writing clean, maintainable code


Experience with financial datasets, credit scoring, or risk modeling is a strong plus





Not sure you meet evert single requirement? Don‚Äôt worry ‚Äî if this role excites you and you believe you could be a good fit, we‚Äôd still love to hear from you. At Prestatech, we value potential, curiosity, and passion just as much as experience.


Benefits



Excellent compensation aligned with your experience and impact


A career path that allows you to take yourself to the next level


Annual training budget to help you grow and develop


2 days per week of Smart Working (+ 3 days at the office)


Flexible working arrangements, with the understanding that building a successful startup sometimes requires periods of focused, intense work


Bi-annual company offsites


Referral bonus


a co-working office in one of the best district of Milan (Isola)





Recruitment Process:





HR Interview (30 minutes)


Assessment Test (up to 60 minutes)


CEO/CTO Interview (30 minutes)





If you have any specific requirements or need accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know ‚Äî we‚Äôre happy to support you.




At Prestatech, we actively embrace diversity and are committed to fostering a safe, inclusive, and welcoming workplace for everyone. Our recruitment process is free from discrimination of any kind ‚Äî including on the basis of race, national or ethnic origin, age, religion, disability, sex, gender identity, or sexual orientation.




With over 25 employees from more than 15 different countries, our diversity drives innovation, enriches our culture, and challenges us to consider multiple perspectives every day.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Enabling What‚Äôs Next




Who We Areüòé

Born in 2004 as Techedge, we have almost 20 years of expertise that enabled us to become what we are today: Avvale!

This path led us to be able to count on over 3,000 employees, present in 11 countries around the world.




What We Doüå±

We help public and private companies to re-design their business models through the development of innovative and sustainable solutions, which have a positive impact not only on our customers but also on the world we live in!




How we doüí°

Through circular economy models, made possible thanks to technological innovation.




Role and responsibilities




You will be part of an area that takes care of Artificial Intelligence.




As a Data Scientist, you will work for customers and internal research departments on complex and innovative projects about genAI, NLP, demand forecasting, predictive maintenance, computer vision, and lots more, in various fields and sectors.

You will focus on solving complex problems: translating requirements into actionable rules and

deliverables.




You will be responsible for:

‚óè Analyzing business needs and suggest the most effective technical approach to meet them.

‚óè Performing EDA around a great amount of heterogeneous data and trigger and driving the discussion among DS team members.

‚óè Leveraging the application of advanced statistical methods, implementing the solution and delegating tasks to Junior DS team members maintaining the main responsibility on the final solution quality.

‚óè Validating statistical models focusing on their explainability and ability to generalize.

‚óè Preparing and presenting technical and non-technical reports to detail the final solution, being able to adapt the story telling based on interlocutors‚Äô level.

‚óè Staying informed about updates in Data Science and related fields, proposing new ideas and participating in pre-sales activities.

‚óè Being a mentor for Junior Data Scientists.




Required Skillsüõπ

‚óè Have at least 3 years of relevant work experience

‚óè Have significant experience (2+ years) applying advanced analytics to a variety of business situations and a proven ability to synthesize complex data and presenting final results; as well as a deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical underpinnings

‚óè Have a Bachelor or Master‚Äôs Degree in quantitative fields such as Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, and Engineering with excellent grades

‚óè Be proficient in Python

‚óè Be fluent in Italian and proficient in English




It would be appreciated if you have:

‚óè Experience with genAI projects, document understanding and virtual assistance;

‚óè Knowledge of Cloud provider (Azure, AWS, GCP)




Come with usüí™

You will have the opportunity to work and get in touch with international players who will allow you to increase your know-how in view of future challenges!




We do not consider applications without CV.

Avvale promotes equal opportunity. We enhance diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment in compliance with applicable non-discrimination and data protection laws.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
In Altitudo, brand di Arsenalia, avrai la possibilit√† di partecipare attivamente alla vita dell‚Äôazienda mettendo in gioco le tue competenze digitali e la tua creativit√†. Sarai inserito in un contesto smart, dinamico ed internazionale, che favorisce la collaborazione, valorizza i talenti, promuove l‚Äôautenticit√† e ne sviluppa le potenzialit√† attuando continui piani di crescita professionale.

‚ÄúCerchiamo un professionista che dia un contributo rilevante ai nostri ambiziosi progetti ad alto contenuto tecnologico‚Äù

Cosa ti aspetta



Svilupperai modelli predittivi e algoritmi di machine learning e deep learning, monitorando e ottimizzando le performance.
Collaborerai con i clienti per comprendere le loro esigenze e tradurle in soluzioni data-driven.
Lavorarerai con team di sviluppo per implementare soluzioni basate sui dati utilizzando Azure Databricks, Microsoft Fabric e Azure Machine Learning.
Parteciperai a progetti di ricerca e sviluppo per migliorare le tecniche di analisi.
Ti occuperai della creazione di report e visualizzazioni per presentare i risultati delle analisi.
Analizzerai grandi quantit√† di dati per estrarre informazioni utili.
Utilizzerai strumenti e tecnologie Microsoft per la gestione e l'analisi dei dati, come SQL Server e Azure SQL Database.
Svilupperai e farai l'ottimizzazione di prompt per modelli LLM o SLM per migliorare l'interazione e l'efficacia delle soluzioni AI.
Analizzerai grandi quantit√† di dati per estrarre informazioni utili utilizzando Azure Data Lake e Azure Synapse Analytics.
Lavorerai in un ambiente dinamico e stimolante che ti aiuter√† a crescere, con colleghe e colleghi in gamba e motivati.
Parteciperai a progetti aziendali innovativi che integrano tecnologie avanzate, inclusa l'intelligenza artificiale, per creare soluzioni all'avanguardia.



Requisiti minimi



Hai maturato un‚Äôesperienza di almeno 3 anni come Data Scientist o in un ruolo simile?
Hai maturato competenze solide in linguaggi di programmazione come Python?
Hai esperienza nello sviluppo e ottimizzazione di modelli di machine learning?
Conosci tecniche di prompt engineering per modelli di linguaggio naturale?
Hai sviluppato la capacit√† di analizzare grandi quantit√† di dati e di estrarre informazioni utili?
Sei abituato a lavorare in team e comunicare efficacemente con i clienti?
Hai curiosit√† verso nuove tecnologie?
Parli e scrivi bene in inglese (livello B2)?
Hai flessibilit√† nell‚Äôoperare in contesti nuovi ed in progetti differenti?
Sei disponibile a trasferte di breve e media durata?‚ÄØ



Potresti essere proprio la persona che stiamo cercando!

Requisiti preferenziali



Hai conseguito una laurea in Informatica, Statistica, Matematica o un campo correlato?
Sei in grado di interfacciarti con il cliente, per supportarlo nelle varie fasi del progetto?
Hai maturato esperienze su alcune di queste tecnologie: Azure Data Lake, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Machine Learning, Power BI, Azure Databricks, SQL Server e Azure SQL Database?
Hai maturato esperienze di gestione del progetto?



Ancora meglio!

Scopri il mondo Arsenalia

[incoraggiamo il tuo talento attraverso un percorso di crescita definito]

Arsenalia pone al centro la tua crescita e il tuo talento! Noi crediamo che ogni grande cambiamento derivi dallo sviluppo professionale e personale di ogni singolo individuo. Idee brillanti, ingegno, creativit√† e passione sono costantemente valorizzati e incentivati attraverso percorsi di formazione e nuove opportunit√† di crescita professionale. Il tuo percorso sar√† la rappresentazione dell‚Äôimpegno e della proattivit√† con cui vorrai contribuire a sfide e progetti. In Arsenalia, il tuo talento non passer√† inosservato!

[siamo una squadra]

In Arsenalia vivrai in prima linea il cambiamento, prendendo parte all‚Äôinnovazione tecnologica che sperimentiamo quotidianamente. Lavorare con noi significa appartenere a una grande squadra dove ognuno gioca un ruolo fondamentale per il raggiungimento degli obiettivi comuni. Il tuo contributo sar√† essenziale per realizzare insieme risultati e progetti sfidanti. Con noi potrai esprimere il tuo potenziale all‚Äôinterno di team dinamici dove vengono valorizzati spirito di iniziativa, autonomia, responsabilit√† e capacit√† di problem solving. Nel tuo lavoro non mancher√† mai l‚Äôappoggio dei team e dei colleghi: le persone in Arsenalia hanno fatto della collaborazione un valore vero e distintivo.

[abbracciamo la modalit√† di lavoro smart]

Arsenalia favorisce la modalit√† di lavoro smart! Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
TL;DR

We're building the next Netsuite/Odoo for the AI-age (an enterprise operations platform)
Founded by the team that scaled GitGuardian and talent.io
Backed by top-tier VCs (3M‚Ç¨ pre-seed)
Thrive in fast-paced AI-startup
Once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to join a tight-knit, world-class early team
Competitive salary plus equity ownership
Location: Remote (EU)




Why now?

Legacy ERPs can‚Äôt handle real-time decisions, AI-native workflows, or modern business speed.
SMEs need to move fast, but their outdated tools slow them down.
Agent frameworks are ready for real business use.




Why join us?

You'll help invent a new category of enterprise software with a small, elite team. The problems go far beyond CRUD: real-time orchestration, autonomous IA-agents, proactive interfaces. This is foundational work. Backed by ‚Ç¨3M from top-tier VCs (Daphni, Ovni, Motier ‚Ä¶) and top BA (Pennylane, Studapart..) we‚Äôre moving fast from zero to one.




What you‚Äôll build

The goal of our AI-native application is to have AI interfaces for most features

You‚Äôll take part in building:

Configuration agents to help users create their automation workflows, adapt the data model to their particular needs, enforce their processes
Data querying agents to extracts precise metrics and information
Data storage merging structured and unstructured data, to extract high level business insights.
Recommendation agents to make our software pro-active




What you bring

You should have experience in both backend web development and Machine learning, applying rigorous, data-driven research approaches to product feature building.

We want you to have the drive to build a new kind of software, less passive, more flexible; and help drive the agentic vision.

Backend expertise: Strong Python skills, databases, distributed systems, and async processing (Django/FastAPI a bonus).
Applied AI skills: Experience with the python machine learning ecosystem, NLP, agentic frameworks (we know it‚Äôs a recent field), complex RAG systems.
Ownership: You own features end to end, from design and development to deployment and user feedback. You‚Äôre comfortable talking to customers and iterating quickly.

Talent beats checklists. If you're intrigued, apply anyway.




How we work

Total ownership: End-to-end impact.
Zero bureaucracy: Small, agile team driving rapid execution.
Craft with velocity: We move fast by shipping small and never compromising on excellence.
Radical prioritization: One goal at a time, done right.
No egos: Feedback with recommendations can come from anyone, across any team.




What you get:

Competitive salary (‚Ç¨90k to ‚Ç¨120k/year) + meaningful equity.
Exceptional peers and a cutting-edge AI stack.
Ideal equipment and setup (top-tier gear, remote-friendly).
Regular company offsites (2‚Äì4 times per year) in inspiring locations.
Location: We have offices in Paris and Biarritz. You can also work fully remote, France (preferred)




Who‚Äôs building Piston?

We‚Äôre a tight-knit founding team that‚Äôs scaled from zero to growth before at talent.io and GitGuardian in the last 7 years. We've shipped product, built teams, and grown revenue from scratch. We work across product, engineering, and GTM as one unit, writing code, talking to users, and making the hard calls together. We‚Äôve lived the pain of ERP firsthand, and we‚Äôre building the product we wish we had. We bias for action, care deeply about craft, and know how to move fast without breaking trust.




Interview Process (max 2 weeks)

Intro call with Eric (CEO) ‚Äì 40 min
Technical deep dive with Eug√®ne (CTO) ‚Äì 90 min
Culture fit conversation with Florian (CRO) ‚Äì 30 min
Reference calls (2)
Paid 2-day assessment
Fast offer




This is the moment to shape what come next, not iterate on the past

Apply with a short note on why you're excited: founders@pistonhq.app

Title: Data Scientist
HTML:
We are currently looking for a ‚ÄúData Scientist‚Äù to strengthen the Cronos Europa team.


This position requires a maximum of 5 days per month at client offices. However, teleworking must take place within 2 hours of Brussels.


Responsabilities:

  • Coordination and review of policy units‚Äô business needs;
  • Definition of solutions proposed for servicing policy units‚Äô business needs;
  • Interaction with the business analysts, customer, users, project leaders and the developers;
  • Carry out ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) tasks;
  • Creating, designing and developing data models;
  • Analyse large datasets and propose approaches for optimisation of reporting;
  • Assessment and quality control of data;
  • Preparation of statistical analysis of data for use by policy officers and other stakeholders;
  • Management and processing of data;
  • Reporting of key indicators for different policy fields on the basis of data sets available;
  • Development and maintenance of interactive dashboards in Power BI;
  • Assistance with data management aspects of IT projects developed.


Technical skills:

  • Data Analytics techniques and tools.
  • Power BI (including Power Query).
  • Experience with one or more of the following: Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing, Languages like Visual Basic, SQL, Other business intelligence tools (SAP Business Objects, QlikSense, SAS‚Ä¶), ETL processes and tools (i.e. Azure Data Factory‚Ä¶).
  • SQL tooling (NoSQL DB, MongoDB, Hadoop, SQL).
  • Architectural design and implementation of scalable modern data stores.
  • Knowledge in one of the following areas: predictive (forecasting, recommendation), prescriptive (simulation), sentiment analysis, topic detection, social media crawling and processing, trends/anomalies detection in datasets, recommendation systems.


Profile:

  • Bachelor's degree minimum
  • English fluent
  • Ability to integrate in multicultural environment, team player, discretion, integrity, problem solving.


Why Cronos Group?

We‚Äôll propose you:

  • An attractive salary package
  • A good work-life balance environment
  • The assurance of working in cutting-edge technologies in an entrepreneurial spirit.
  • The opportunity to develop your skills thanks to tailor-made training courses according to your needs
  • A good job in a friendly place

If you wish to integrate a dynamic structure on a human scale while working with the latest technologies, don't wait anymore and join Cronos!

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist ‚Äì AI & Microsoft Services




Location: Brussels (Hybrid ‚Äì 2 days onsite, 3 remote)

Start: ASAP | Type: Freelance




About the Role

We‚Äôre looking for a hands-on Data Scientist / AI Engineer to design and deliver impactful AI applications using Microsoft AI Services, Generative AI, and Copilot. You‚Äôll take on diverse business challenges: from building virtual assistants to automating internal workflows, and turn them into production-ready solutions that enhance customer experiences, empower employees, and optimise processes.




This role is self-directed and innovation-focused. You‚Äôll work with techniques such as Prompt Engineering, RAG, fine-tuning, speech-to-text, image generation & interpretation, and classical ML/statistical methods. You‚Äôll collaborate closely with business stakeholders and technical teams, communicate results directly to leadership, and contribute to reusable AI frameworks in an Agile environment.




Key Responsibilities

Design and implement AI solutions using Microsoft AI ecosystem tools (Azure AI, Azure Machine Learning, Cognitive Services, Copilot)
Apply a mix of Generative AI and Predictive AI methods to real-world use cases
Build proof-of-concepts and evolve them into scalable, production-ready solutions in Python
Share insights with the team and help define AI best practices
Present results and recommendations to senior stakeholders




What You Bring

Strong Python and AI/ML development skills
Experience deploying AI applications into production
Knowledge of Generative AI techniques, with the ability to quickly learn new ones
Problem-solving mindset and ability to turn ideas into deliverables
Clear communicator, able to explain technical concepts to non-technical audiences
Languages: English + French or Dutch

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist ‚Äì Grid Optimization & AI Compliance

About Remobi:

We are Remobi ‚Äì we empower businesses to scale, innovate, and achieve their goals through high-quality technical solutions delivered by high-performing, high-quality, REMOTE nearshore technology teams. Join our Remobi community to gain access to meaningful, innovative freelance projects and play a key role in shaping how companies operate!




Position Overview:

Location: Fully Remote

Role Type: Freelance/B2B/Contract

Duration: Initial 12 Months




Position Summary:

We‚Äôre hiring a Data Scientist to build and deploy reinforcement learning (RL) models that optimize real-time control of energy grid systems. This role focuses on developing scalable, responsible AI solutions that reduce emissions, support compliance, and improve operational efficiency. You‚Äôll work with cutting-edge tools like Grid2Op, L2RPN, and ICTE, integrating your work into cloud-native environments with Python and AWS.

This position suits someone passionate about sustainability, operational AI, and solving complex, real-world challenges.




Responsibilities:

Design, train, and deploy RL models to optimize real-time grid operations.
Use open-source grid simulation platforms (Grid2Op, L2RPN, ICTE) to develop and validate models.
Ensure models comply with regulatory and sustainability standards for AI systems.
Deploy and scale models using AWS services such as SageMaker, Lambda, and S3.
Collaborate with engineers, compliance teams, and energy operations specialists.
Translate technical insights into clear communications for varied stakeholders.




Qualifications:

Proven experience with Reinforcement Learning, ideally applied to physical or control systems.
Advanced Python programming and model deployment skills.
Hands-on use of tools like Grid2Op, L2RPN, ICTE, or similar simulation environments.
Experience deploying models on AWS (SageMaker, Lambda, S3).
Familiarity with smart grid technologies or energy systems is a plus.
Understanding of AI governance, sustainability metrics, or regulatory frameworks.
Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Applied Mathematics, or related technical discipline.




If you‚Äôre interested in this role or know someone who might be a great fit, feel free to apply or get in touch!

Title: Data Scientist
HTML:
The purpose of the Data Scientist is to :

  • support the Biocartis organisation by performing data analysis that is needed for product development (assays, instruments, manufacturing line), QC release and on-market support;
  • support assay development teams by developing decision trees that will be integrated into the assay specific software;
  • support assay development teams (internal and partner) with assay specific software development and writing;
  • support the assay development teams with respect to scientific software tools and data management.


Accountabilities

  • Develops tools and methods to facilitate analysis of the data generated during:
  • Assay Development
  • Cartridge production (including raw materials and semi-finished products)
  • Instrument production
  • Field usage
  • Develops the decision tree that will be integrated in the assay specific software;
  • Writes assay specific software for our Idylla platform (LUA scripting, xml) in support of new assay development requirements of R&D and IVD. This includes definition of methods and data treatment algorithms and documentation.
  • Performs data mining tasks, statistical analysis and assist other project team members with these tasks;
  • Works as a member of a team, is responsible for organising own time and resources in an optimal fashion. Prioritizes assigned projects and manages time accordingly. Is able to handle more than one project simultaneously;
  • Provides planning input and estimations for their work to support the assay PM (project planning), functional lead and Bio IT manager (resource planning).


Profile requirements

  • A Bachelor or a Master in Bioinformatics or other life science discipline or equivalent through experience and/or training;
  • Experience in computational biology;
  • General basic knowledge of
  • SW Development Lifecycle : planning, requirements, design, implementation, verification.
  • Basic knowledge of :
  • Scripting (LUA, Python);
  • Data analysis;
  • Mathematical programming (R);
  • Data visualisation (Spotfire is a plus);
  • Statistics;
  • Machine Learning (classification, regression, ...);
  • Deep Learning;
  • SQL query;
  • non-relational databases (Big data);
  • Molecular biology;
  • Science skills (Electronics, software, mechanics, chemistry, physics, optics, thermodynamics, fluids).
  • Basic knowledge in IBM Synergy & Change, git, Team Foundation Server (TFS), Azure Development Server (ADS)
  • Time management;
  • Problem identification;
  • Problem analysis;
  • Independency;
  • Analytical thinking;
  • Flexibility;
  • Has good technical writing skills;
  • Cross-functional working and well-developed interpersonal skills;
  • Eagerness to learn/assimilate novel concepts;
  • Strong communication skills;
  • Demonstrate good oral presentations skills;
  • Thrives in a fast-paced and changing environment;
  • Fluent in English both written and spoken, knowledge of Dutch is a plus.


Our offering

We offer you a challenging job in an exciting environment, working for top entrepreneurs in the biotech industry. You can be part of a very dynamic, young and growing team in a highly innovative environment. You will have freedom to shape your work and shape your job. Your input is highly appreciated.

Of course we offer you a fitting compensation package with various benefits which includes a Flexible Income Plan.

Our hybrid work regime offers flexibility for a better Work/Life balance.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
B.E.S. (Business & Engineering Solutions) is growing and thus welcoming a new Machine Learning Engineer in our Automotive team.




As an Machine Learning Engineer at B.E.S., you will enjoy a collaborative environment where you will work closely with others in an organization that encourages and values collaboration, mentoring, and continuous learning.




Your responsabilities:




Design, develop, and adapt algorithms based on the latest state-of-the-art multimodal models.
Stay up to date with cutting-edge research in deep learning and generative AI.
Implement, optimize, and maintain models, ensuring clean and well-documented code repositories.
Collaborate closely with the researchers and external partners.
Build Proof of Concepts and working prototypes.
Contribute to scientific publications for major conferences (NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, CVPR, ECCV).
Support the integration, testing, and deployment of models in real-world environments (cloud, edge, embedded systems).




Your profile:




MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, or related field.
2‚Äì5 years‚Äô experience in machine learning or deep learning, with a proven research background.
Strong expertise in classical and modern ML/DL methods, foundation models, and Transformer architectures.
Proficient in Python; C++ knowledge is a plus.
Hands-on experience with PyTorch or TensorFlow, Linux, Docker, and Git.
Familiarity with HPC and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure).
Skilled in Hugging Face tools (transformers, datasets, tokenizers, Trainer API).
Practical, results-driven, and solution-oriented mindset.
Ability to work under pressure, manage multiple tasks, and deliver high-quality results.
Self-motivated, scientifically curious, collaborative, and an excellent communicator.

What can you except as a B.E.S. consultant?




Great projects in Engineering and High Technologies through major players to develop your technical skills and hard skills,
Knowledge sharing processes though our competences centers and experts' communities to grow your multi-sectorial knowledge,
A strong development plan to improve your soft skills such as Leadership, Communication skills, Change & People management capabilities‚Ä¶
A full package made of gross salary on 13.92 months, lunch allowance, entertainment expenses, company car & fuel card, group insurances OR a freelance contract,
A friendly, lively working environment within a dynamic and motivated team !!

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Freelance Machine Learning Engineer




Location: Brussels

Type: Freelance (Daily Rate)

Duration: 6 Months, with potential extension

Start Date: ASAP




Montash has partnered with a leading organisation to deliver production-ready AI solutions, and we‚Äôre now looking to engage a freelance AI/ML Engineer with a strong focus on industrialising machine learning pipelines.




The Role:

As an AI/ML Engineer, you‚Äôll act as the bridge between Data Science and IT Production, ensuring that ML models are not only functional but fully integrated, monitored, and scalable in a production environment.




Key Responsibilities:

Build and automate robust ML pipelines ready for production deployment
Collaborate closely with Data Scientists to translate models into scalable solutions
Support deployment with CI/CD pipelines, containerisation (Docker/Kubernetes), and infrastructure alignment
Ensure continuous monitoring, retraining, and version control of models in live environments
Drive integration of AI services with appropriate data flow, ingestion, and real-time architecture




Required Experience:

3+ years in ML engineering or related production environments
Strong hands-on skills with Python (incl. async programming & optimisation)
Experience with Linux, Docker, Kubernetes, GitLab CI/CD, and PostgreSQL
Knowledge of AI platforms, Spark, ELT/ETL tools, and data visualisation is a plus
Agile mindset with strong communication skills and stakeholder awareness
Fluent in English and ideally Dutch/French




Interested?

HTML:
Freelance Machine Learning Engineer


Location: Brussels

Type: Freelance (Daily Rate)

Duration: 6 Months, with potential extension

Start Date: ASAP


Montash has partnered with a leading organisation to deliver production-ready AI solutions, and we‚Äôre now looking to engage a freelance AI/ML Engineer with a strong focus on industrialising machine learning pipelines.


The Role:

As an AI/ML Engineer, you‚Äôll act as the bridge between Data Science and IT Production, ensuring that ML models are not only functional but fully integrated, monitored, and scalable in a production environment.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Build and automate robust ML pipelines ready for production deployment
  • Collaborate closely with Data Scientists to translate models into scalable solutions
  • Support deployment with CI/CD pipelines, containerisation (Docker/Kubernetes), and infrastructure alignment
  • Ensure continuous monitoring, retraining, and version control of models in live environments
  • Drive integration of AI services with appropriate data flow, ingestion, and real-time architecture


Required Experience:

  • 3+ years in ML engineering or related production environments
  • Strong hands-on skills with Python (incl. async programming & optimisation)
  • Experience with Linux, Docker, Kubernetes, GitLab CI/CD, and PostgreSQL
  • Knowledge of AI platforms, Spark, ELT/ETL tools, and data visualisation is a plus
  • Agile mindset with strong communication skills and stakeholder awareness
  • Fluent in English and ideally Dutch/French


Interested?

If you're immediately available and this sounds like the right fit, please get in touch today with your CV and availability to shaip@montash.nl

Title: Junior Data Scientist & AI (‚Ç¨50k-‚Ç¨80k) - EU
Description:
Our goal is to help every recent graduate worldwide find a job that aligns with their ambitions: join us to make the aspirations of a community of over 1,500,000 users come true!




We are constantly looking for students, recent graduates, and junior professionals (with 0 to 3 years of experience) who aspire to join our team across Europe. Apply for this position, and our HR team will contact you as soon as a relevant role becomes available and your profile matches our requirements.




For all Junior positions in the Tech Field, we offer a full remote contract (Annual Salary: ‚Ç¨50k-‚Ç¨80k) in the EU Region, you will have the opportunity to grow exponentially thanks to on-the-job training, you will be able to work in one of our offices or fully remote for as long as you want and we will equip you with a latest generation MacBook.




We are looking only for Junior profiles, with 0 to 3 years of experience.

--




Responsibilities:

Within the team, you may be responsible for one or more of the following tasks:

Implementation of Machine Learning Algorithms: You will have the opportunity to implement and test machine learning algorithms, contributing to the development of intelligent solutions for business challenges. Specifically, working alongside our tech team, you will be involved in Joinrs AI: our Artificial Intelligence model that assists our community in finding employment.
Data Analysis and Modeling: You will participate in data analysis, developing predictive models and contributing to provide meaningful insights to enhance business decisions.
Data Visualization: You will learn to create clear and informative data visualizations to effectively communicate complex results to various stakeholders. In particular, you will create interactive dashboards to showcase data and Key Performance Indicators (Data Visualization) to the team, clients, investors, and all key stakeholders.
Optimization of Business Processes: You will collaborate in identifying and optimizing business processes through the application of data-driven solutions.
Participation in Technological Brainstorming Sessions: You will be involved in brainstorming sessions to generate innovative ideas and contribute to identifying new opportunities in the field of Artificial Intelligence.
Continuous Training and Updates on the Latest Trends: You will have access to continuous training programs to stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in the fields of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence.




--




What We Offer:

Working in the Joinrs team means being able to choose the best psychophysical conditions for tranquility and productivity. This translates into:

Remote working and flexibility. You'll have the opportunity to work remotely full-time, but you can also use one of our offices.
Dynamic work environment. Our offices remain open, providing shared workspaces, meeting rooms, break areas, and a bar with fresh fruit and various snacks. You'll also find a foosball table and a gaming station. We aim for an informal work environment that encourages shared moments, always respecting individual activities.
Team building & fun. We frequently organize aperitifs, games, and leisure moments, which are integral parts of life at Joinrs, both inside and outside the office.
Company welfare. We guarantee you a company welfare package that meets your expectations.
Tech pack. You'll use advanced software and modern technologies, and you'll be provided with the latest-generation MacBook.
Training. You'll always have a mentor in your Joinrs journey, acting as a reference for both technical and team aspects. We ensure constant professional growth with progressively increasing responsibilities. You can participate in industry events and training courses, along with continuous education on the best e-learning platforms.
Social Impact. Your contribution will support thousands of recent graduates in finding the job they aspire to.

--




Who We Are:

Our mission is to support every recent graduate and junior professional in achieving their goals, helping them start their careers with optimism and a clear vision for their future.




We are a united team that strongly believes in collaboration: together we work, discuss, and achieve results that inspire us to aim for ever more ambitious goals.




Our community includes over 1,500,000 members across the US, UK, Europe, and Brazil, as well as 300+ companies like PwC, Accenture, Gi Group, Danone, and Siemens. And we‚Äôre growing fast‚Äîjoin us!

--




Contract & Compensation:

For all Junior positions we offer a full remote contract (Annual Salary: ‚Ç¨50k-‚Ç¨80k).




Salary reviews are scheduled every six months, with your compensation increasing rapidly as you gain experience and translate it into a more significant impact.

--




Selection Process:

CV Screening: The first step is a curriculum vitae (CV) screening (usually within 20 days of application).

Phone Interview: The second step involves a 15-minute phone interview with our HR Manager.

Video Interview: The final step is a video interview with both the HR Manager and your future supervisor, lasting at least 45 minutes.

--




Why Join Our Team?

Social Impact: You'll have the opportunity to support our community in realizing their ambitions, as well as your own.

Successful Startup: Joinrs was selected among the top 10 startups globally at the Web Summit in Lisbon.

Exponential Personal Growth: You'll have the opportunity for exponential growth, both in hard and soft skills, thanks to a training program based on on-the-job training and online support.

Title: Expert in AI/NLP/ML
HTML:
Company Description

ACT DIGITAL

Job Description

WORKING METHODS, ENVIRONMENT AND CONDITIONS

Project duration: 550 days

Initial contract duration: 150 days

Expected start date: 01/10/2025

Service delivery mode: Near-Site/Hybrid in Brussels

Certifications & Standards

Following certificates & standards are mandatory for the performance of tasks:

  • Certifications in Data Science and Machine Learning, especially related to AI/ML with Python.

SPECIFIC EXPERTISE

Following specific expertise is mandatory for the performance of the tasks:

  • Experience (at least 10 years) in Solution Architecture and System Design for large-scale IT projects, ideally in EU organisations;
  • In-depth knowledge of Data Science and Machine Learning principles;
  • Good knowledge of AI frameworks such as Haystack, Langchain, etc.;
  • Expertise in software requirements engineering, with an ability to translate complex stakeholder requirements into solutions and detailed technical specifications;
  • Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, along with experience in using development tools like GIT, GitLab, Jira, Confluence, etc.;
  • Knowledgeable in standard web technologies like API driven architecture, Single Page Application, Backend-for-Frontend, etc.;
  • Experience with database management systems (PostgreSQL, etc.) and search engines (Elastic Search, etc.);
  • Good knowledge of quality procedures and their application in the software development life cycle;
  • Good knowledge of information systems governance;
  • Good knowledge of cloud technologies.

Knowledge And Skills

Following skills and knowledge are required for the performance of the above listed tasks:

  • Very good knowledge of AI/ML technologies
  • Ability to follow the fast pace of emerging technologies and solutions esp. in the gen AI domain
  • Ability to establish high-level vision regarding the architectural landscape
  • Strong analysis and problem solving skills
  • Capability to write clear and structured technical documents
  • Good communication skills with technical and non-technical audiences
  • Ability to give business and technical presentations
  • Ability to participate and lead technical meetings

Description Of The Tasks

The following is a non-exhaustive list of tasks that will be performed by the external service provider:

  • Support the GAIA Programme team in the context of application architecture and system design;
  • Define & maintain an architectural vision & goverview of the GAIA landscape and registry of design related artefacts;
  • Analyse gen AI architecture for consistency, completeness, accuracy and reasonableness;
  • Oversee, monitor and report on vendor and contractor technical implementation activities in the GAIA Programme;
  • Establish quality control mechanisms and implement actions to maintain architectural consistency across the GAIA application landscape;
  • Coordinate the architectural discussions with other Commission stakeholders in the GAIA Programme;
  • Contribute with architectural advice to Commission projects that make use of the GAIA horizontal solutions;

Qualifications

A minimum educational qualification for lot 3 is: Level of education corresponding to Level 7 of the European Qualification Framework which typically corresponds to a master‚Äôs level or 5 years of higher education.

Data Scientist (Consultancy ‚Äì Automotive Sector)

Fully Remote (Europe)

‚Ç¨550+ per day

Contract




About the Role:

We‚Äôre seeking an experienced Data Scientist to join a leading consultancy delivering cutting-edge data solutions to clients within the automotive industry. You‚Äôll work on exciting projects involving machine learning, predictive modelling, and data-driven insights that directly impact innovation in the sector.

Excellent communication skills and ability to work independently in a fully remote setup.
Based anywhere in Europe with eligibility to work as a contractor.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Don‚Äôt settle for just any consulting company‚Äîchoose the one that‚Äôs right for you!




We‚Äôre on the lookout for a Data Scientist to join our rapidly expanding AI & Data start-up.




At Data Wizards, we are a team of experts in AI & Data who advocate for human-centered AI development and usage. We partner with innovative companies from strategy to implementation to help them achieve their goals by unlocking the full potential of their data assets respecting cultural and ethical norms.




You're making the right choice to apply if you're eager to be part of an ambitious, high-energy team filled with curious, proactive minds who are passionate about AI and driven by integrity.




However, this isn‚Äôt the job for you if you‚Äôre looking for a routine, copy-paste kind of role. Here, every day is different, and we love people who take initiative, embrace challenges, and think outside the box. üöÄ




As a Data Scientist, your mission would include:

Leading the technical aspects of data science projects, from conception to deployment.
Designing and implementing scalable data science solutions that integrate seamlessly with existing infrastructures.
Developing and optimizing machine learning models to drive actionable insights and automation.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including data engineers and business stakeholders, to align technical solutions with strategic goals.
Taking ownership of projects, ensuring high-quality deliverables in an agile environment.
Providing technical leadership and mentorship to junior data scientists.
Engaging in proof-of-concept (PoC) projects and scaling them into production-ready solutions.
Working in cloud-based environments and following MLOps best practices.
Communicating insights and technical solutions effectively to diverse audiences.




You‚Äôre a step closer to joining our team if you bring:




Background:

Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, AI, or a related technical field.
4+ years of experience in Data Science, Machine Learning, or AI-driven projects.
Experience in client-facing role, consulting companies are considered as a plus.
Experience in diverse industries and solutions, demonstrating adaptability and problem-solving skills is considered as a plus.




Technical Skills:

Strong programming skills in Python and SQL.
Expertise in machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn).
Hands-on experience with big data technologies and cloud platforms (AWS preferred; Azure is a plus).
Experience deploying ML models and following MLOps best practices.
Understanding of data engineering principles to support scalable AI solutions.
Ability to design and implement proof-of-concept (PoC) projects and scale them into production.




Soft Skills:

Autonomous & Proactive: You take initiative and drive projects forward.
Curious & Adaptive: You embrace learning and thrive in dynamic environments.
Solution-Oriented: You balance technical rigor with business impact.
Clear Communicator: You simplify complex ideas for diverse audiences.
Collaborative & Supportive: You work well in teams.
Creative Thinker: You find innovative solutions to challenging problems.




Practical Info:

Languages: Fluent in English. French or Dutch Native.




We know that finding the right job isn‚Äôt just about the role‚Äîit‚Äôs about what‚Äôs in it for you, too. While we‚Äôre a start-up, we‚Äôre big on taking care of our people right from day one.




Here‚Äôs a sneak peek at what we offer:




üí∞ A compensation package that keeps you motivated:

Competitive salary
Mobility budget or company car with a fuel card
30 days of paid time off
A top-tier laptop & smartphone with a subscription
Representation allowances
Hospitalization & dental insurance
Meal vouchers
Opportunity to earn company stock over time




üéØ A place to be your best self, grow, and thrive:

Work with the most innovative technologies in Data & AI
Work in an agile, collaborative environment
Hybrid work model
Monthly team-building events (plus one epic annual celebration)
Tailored training programs to fuel your career growth
A cool, ergonomic office with creative meeting spaces
A Nintendo Switch for spontaneous Mario Kart battles üéÆ
A massage chair for those deep-thinking moments üßò
Fresh coffee & drinks to keep you energized ‚òï




‚ú® And most importantly, a fast-growing company where opportunities are limitless!




Our Recruitment Process:

Quick intro call with our HR team
HR Interview
Case study/Technical Interview
Final Interview




How to apply?

You can apply right here on LinkedIn with your CV.




If you‚Äôre passionate about what we do but aren‚Äôt sure you meet every single requirement‚Äîdon‚Äôt hesitate to apply. We value potential, mindset, and growth as much as experience. At Data Wizards, we believe diversity is our strength. We welcome candidates from all backgrounds and experiences because different viewpoints help us grow and evolve.




Let‚Äôs build the future of AI & Data, together.




Please note: As a consulting company, our recruitment process can be either project-driven or based on strong profiles we believe in. The consultancy world moves fast, and while we always aim to match great talent with the right opportunity, there might not always be an immediate fit. With your permission, we‚Äôll gladly keep your profile in mind for future missions ‚Äî and hope to collaborate with you soon on an exciting project at Data Wizards!
